nhc_headline: ...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR THE BIG ISLAND OF HAWAII...
summary:
...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR THE BIG ISLAND OF HAWAII...
 As of 5:00 PM HST Fri Aug 23
 the center of Hone was located near 16.9, -149.3
 with movement W at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
